BalanceReserve.description: The Balance Reserve Operation resource is a detailed description of a balance reserve operation requested over a subscription

confirmationDate.description: Date when the reserve request was confirmed in the server

href.description: A resource URI pointing to the resource in the OB that stores the detailed information about a reserve

id.description: Unique Identifier within the server for the reserve operation request

isAutoDeduct.description: Indicates if the reserved balance is auto deducted after a time period

remainedAmount.description: Amount (can be monetary or non-monetary) to be remained in the bucket

requestedDate.description: Date when the reserve request was received in the server

reservedAmount.description: Amount (can be monetary or non-monetary) to be reserved in the bucket

reserveType.description: A preconfigured value that describes a reserve type which determines the prepay balance bucket in which the reserve is done

validFor.description: Indicates if the reserved balance is auto deducted after a time period
